ygData.subject: FW: For everyone not online last night
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Sarah... Andi... Faesong.. [mailto:princess@murkworks.net] Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 12:21 PM To: EQPhoenix Cc: Eqbards Subject: For everyone not
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Sarah... Andi... Faesong.. [mailto:princess@...]
Sent: Friday, April 07, 2000 12:21 PM
To: EQPhoenix
Cc: Eqbards
Subject: For everyone not online last night


Faesong [Angelfire]@Solusek Ro has finally surpassed Faesong [Joat]@Test

She made 17 last night, and can dual wield like a true bard (I
also learned that this is the level of Sneak.) She reached this
"exalted" level at 3d, 23 h, 1 min.

What is even more surprising is that I learned she can dual wield
WITHOUT training. After I hit 17, I put two weapons in her two hands...
(Staff of Writhing and PGT in the off-hand) And it let me! On my way back
to Qeynos to buy my song, I saw a highland lion that conned blue.
I went and attacked it. I saw BOTH crushing and slashing attacks.
AND I got two increases in Dual Wield (which evidently starts at 35...
Very odd. It went up to 36 and 37 as I watched)

Definitely a Stamina drain though. She was down just under 2bub of stamina
after killing the blue.

What level does Obsidian Dagger start proc'ing? That weighs less so may
make a better offhand weapon and trade off with slashing and crushing in
the main hand. (I want to keep all three skills maxed)

Now that she's 17, I'm going to park her down in the ARena area. Get
a bind in Arena. Fight kodiaks in Rathe Mountains (they were doing
good for FAerain and Anna at 18-19. if she can get a partner, I don't
think they will be too bad at 17 either.) and aviaks in Lake Ratheteer
and South karana. (Don't ask me. I like fighting aviaks.)

What comes next:
I ordered Kunark.

I want to get Meara [Daring] to 20 before the expansion comes out and
make her EARN that last name. (Right now, appears 20 is when Illusion:
Iksar is going to be available) She went to Sol A at level 9. I want
her to go to Kunark -- all the way down to the newbie areas -- at level
20. Once she has done this, I will deem her worthy of the name she wants.
She can hang out down there, make friends with all the newbie Iksars. And
maybe group with them as they get of age to be grouped with. Do quests,
hopefully get her faction up such that she can do some selling and not be
KoS with the guards. (Hopefully there will be a bank at the outpost.
If so, I'll make do without banking privileges in Iksar... Don't want to
be KoS in Freeport either, really... I like being able to go anywhere I
want.)

I *think* that this is doable (getting Meara to 20), even for my rate of
leveling. It just takes actually being online and wanting to play... Faesong
got from 16 to 17 in just two nights of playing... And I think meara is
halfway to 17 already.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Meara, level 16 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
<lvl 6 paladin -- baby BASHer!>
